issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Alloy
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the Alloy here.

components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description: Break points in Appcelerator Studio are not being hit in debug mode running against an iPhone 6 Sim or against iPhone 6 hardware. I have set breakpoints in the index.js and directory.js the first screens that are loaded. However execution is not pausing.
fields.summary: Breakpoints are not being hit on Mac OS 10.10 with Titanium 4.1
fields.environment:
Computer: Macbook Pro Retina 15"
OS X: 10.10.4
Appcelerator Studio, build: 4.1.0.201507071122
Eclipse Platform Version: 4.4.0.v20140606-1558
Titanium Studio Version: 4.1.0.201507071122-867dFEkFGvmRj9uZJPGr3p8SNCXc
Aptana Studio 3 Version: 4.1.0.1436205599-B37d8FCK0lhq007aE9833355984B
IOS 8.4
X Code 6.4
iPhone 6 Sim

comments.body:
Hello [~seanmac],

 We did not reproduce it on this following environment.  Could you please attach a minimal test code to reproduce this issue? Also test this following environment then let us know.

*Testing Environment*
Command-Line Interface, version 4.1.2
Ti SDK: 4.1.0.GA
iOS Simulator: 6(v8.4),
OS X: 10.10.4,
Appcelerator Studio, build: 4.1.1.201507141126,

Thanks.
